data.title: Mr. Bean Season 1 Streaming: Watch & Stream Online via Hulu & Amazon Prime Video
data.meta_description: Mr. Bean Season 1 is a classic British sitcom featuring Rowan Atkinson as the iconic character who navigates everyday life with hilarious misadventures and minimal dialogue, relying on physical comedy for humor. Here’s how you can watch and stream Mr. Bean Season 1 via streaming services such as Hulu and Amazon Prime Video. data.text:
Mr. Bean Season 1 is a classic British sitcom featuring Rowan Atkinson as the iconic character who navigates everyday life with hilarious misadventures and minimal dialogue, relying on physical comedy for humor.

Here’s how you can watch and stream Mr. Bean Season 1 via streaming services such as Hulu and Amazon Prime Video.

Is Mr. Bean Season 1 available to watch via streaming?

Yes, Mr. Bean Season 1 is available to watch via streaming on Hulu.

Mr. Bean Season 1 is a beloved British comedy series starring Rowan Atkinson as the titular character, a bumbling and socially awkward man who frequently finds himself in comical predicaments. Each episode follows Mr. Bean as he embarks on various everyday tasks, from shopping to attending a funeral, with his unique and often absurd approach, leading to uproarious and slapstick humor.

The cast of Mr. Bean primarily includes Rowan Atkinson as the titular character, with recurring appearances by supporting actors like Matilda Ziegler, Robin Driscoll, and others.

Watch Mr. Bean Season 1 streaming via Hulu

Mr. Bean Season 1 is available to watch on Hulu. It is a popular streaming service that offers a wide range of TV shows, movies, and original content for subscribers.

You can watch the show via Hulu by following these steps:

Go to Hulu.com/welcome

Select ‘Start Your Free Trial’

Choose a plan:

$7.99 per month or $79.99 per year (With Ads)

$17.99 per month (No Ads)

Hulu (With Ads) is the cheapest option, providing users access to Hulu’s streaming library with commercials. Hulu (No Ads) is the service’s premium option, providing access to its library without any advertisements. There are also several bundles available with Hulu that pair the service with Disney Plus and ESPN Plus, along with Live TV plans that also include many live TV channels.

Watch Mr. Bean Season 1 streaming via Amazon Prime Video

Mr. Bean Season 1 is available to watch on Amazon Prime Video.

You can watch via Amazon Prime Video by following these steps:

Go to Amazon Prime Video

Select ‘Sign in’ and ‘Create your Amazon account’

Sign up for a Prime Video membership:

$14.99 per month or $139 per year with an Amazon Prime membership

$8.99 per month for a standalone Prime Video membership

Amazon Prime is the online retailer’s paid service that provides fast shipping and exclusive sales on products, so the membership that includes both this service and Prime Video is the company’s most popular offering. However, you can also opt to subscribe to Prime Video separately.

Mr. Bean’s synopsis is as follows:

“Mr Bean turns simple everyday tasks into chaotic situations and will leave you in stitches as he creates havoc wherever he goes.”

NOTE: The streaming services listed above are subject to change. The information provided was correct at the time of writing.
